title: Pogačar-to-Giro Speculation Builds Ahead of Giro d’Italia, Tour de France presentations
content:
Rumors are flying that Tadej Pogačar could race the 2024 Giro d'Italia. Details of the 'corsa rosa' will be revealed Friday, with the Tour de France route unveiled October 25.

Read the full article at Pogačar-to-Giro Speculation Builds Ahead of Giro d’Italia, Tour de France presentations on Velo.
author: ahood
